description: This Java class, MessageNativeCodeProducer, is responsible for generating native code (C/C++) message handling files for an IPC (Inter-Process Communication) system. It creates header and source files for message codes, client API functions, and service handlers based on templates, for both client and server sides, and processes message wrappers and dependencies.

classes.name: MessageNativeCodeProducer
classes.description: A class that generates native C/C++ IPC message code files (headers and source) based on Java message wrappers, templates, and context information.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Coordinates the generation of all IPC native code files, including headers and source files for messages and service handlers.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Indicates this class does not generate wrapper files for native code.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Indicates this class does not produce wrapper buffers for native code.

methods.name: generateCodesHeader
methods.description: Creates the header file defining message codes for IPC, including enums and macro definitions.

methods.name: generateClientFunctionsHeader
methods.description: Creates the header file declaring client API functions for sending IPC messages.

methods.name: generateClientFunctionsBody
methods.description: Generates the source (.c) file implementing the client functions to send IPC messages.

methods.name: generateServiceFunctionsHeader
methods.description: Creates the header file declaring service handler functions for receiving and decoding IPC messages.

methods.name: generateServiceFunctionsBody
methods.description: Generates the source (.c) file implementing the service handler functions for IPC.

methods.name: combineIncludes
methods.description: Assembles and returns a sorted list of #include directives for header files.
